acts.challenge: Add inline markdown editing and one-key todo creation to the TUI preparation view, enabling zero-friction brain-dump workflows.
acts.build: Standalone Textual editor micro-app (teleclaude.cli.editor) with markdown highlighting, launched in the right tmux pane via the existing PaneManagerBridge architecture. Reuses established message→bridge→pane pipeline pattern instead of embedding.
acts.gauntlet: Two review rounds with clean approval. One important finding caught: stale docstring in todo_scaffold.py listing 4 files but now creating 5 (input.md missing). Fixed by reviewer feedback. No critical blockers.
acts.next: Non-blocking opportunities: live preview (split editor + rendered markdown side-by-side), view refresh optimization after todo creation for immediate UI feedback
